${ModID}:Hyperactivity.NAME: Hyperactivity
${ModID}:Hyperactivity.FLAVOR: Every 4 cards exhausted, gain 1 energy. Gain 3 Struggles when out of cards to play
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 4 cards exhausted, gain 1 energy. Gain 3 Struggles when out of cards to play

${ModID}:StruggleBus.NAME: Struggle Bus
${ModID}:StruggleBus.FLAVOR: Stronger Struggles, Most Exhausting, Keep swinging!
DESCRIPTIONS: Stronger Struggles, Keep swinging, then Flail! Exhaust 3 cards for a Flail
